name: gymart-monorepo
description: GymArt fullstack application with Express API, Next.js client, and PostgreSQL

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=client && npm run build --workspace=api
scripts.test:all: npm run test:all --workspace=api && npm run test:e2e --workspace=client
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=api && npm run lint --workspace=client
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=api && npm run lint:fix --workspace=client
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=api && npm run format --workspace=client
